summary:
Handful of textures to (Hopefully, and a little in practice) fit the mesh from http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/?

( A Steel Heater Shield ) by Abacus - Basic texture outlines are his, they were only edited by me
descriptionHtml:
A collection of wooden based texture assets to match the mesh in 'A Steel Heater Shield - Abacus' ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/? )

Solitude texture was heavily inspired by 'Alternate Shield of Solitude - ImJustAGamer' ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28674/? )

Textures used to edit / change segments are all assets of Bethesda and are taken from the Vanilla game BSA's, any efforts in changing textures is on my behalf, however it is free to edit.

This is a modders resource and can be used anyway without permission from me, however rights to basic texture shapes belongs to Abacus and I will remove this file if asked.


( I do not know whether these textures will work perfectly and they do look a little strange at certain points, but they are free to use = ) )


I think that's about right?
author: The_Bereaver
